text: Raghunathpur may refer to: ==Towns in India== * Raghunathpur, Aurangabad - a village in Haspura block of Aurangabad District of Bihar state in India * Raghunathpur, Buxar – a town in Buxar district, Bihar * Bhangar Raghunathpur – a town in South 24 Parganas district, West Bengal * Raghunathpur (PS-Dankuni) – a town in Hooghly district, West Bengal * Raghunathpur (PS-Magra) – a town in Hooghly district, West Bengal * Raghunathpur, Purulia – a town in Purulia district, West Bengal * Raghunathpur, Uttar Pradesh – a village in Ghaziabad district, Uttar Pradesh * Raghunathpur - a village in 'Khanakul' thana,'Arambagh' subdivision.'Hooghly' district of West Bengal * Raghunathpur, Chanditala-I - a village in Srirampore subdivision of Hooghly district, West Bengal * Raghunathpur, Bhubaneswar - a village and upcoming neighborhood of Bhubaneswar, Orissa ==Towns in Bangladesh== * Raghunathpur, Patuakhali District * Raghunathpur, Pirojpur District * Raghunathpur, Thakurgoan District ==Towns in Nepal== *Raghunathpur, Bara *Raghunathpur, Janakpur *Raghunathpur, Mahottari *Raghunathpur, Rautahat ==Electoral constituencies== * Raghunathpur, Purulia (Vidhan Sabha constituency) in West Bengal * Raghunathpur, Siwan (Vidhan Sabha constituency) in Bihar ==Community development blocks== * Raghunathpur I (community development block) in Purulia district, West Bengal * Raghunathpur II (community development block) in Purulia district, West Bengal ==Other uses== * Raghunathpur subdivision, in Purulia district, West Bengal
title: Raghunathpur
